00041 bool RDFParser::parse(char *pathFile) {
00042     DataTime t1, t2;
00043     getTime(&t1);
00044     cout.precision(4);
00045 
00046     // Parsing the config file
00047     cout << "[" << showpoint << t1.user - t1.user << "]  Parsing config file: "
00048             << pathFile << endl;
00049     bool parsed = parseConfig(pathFile);
00050 
00051     map<string, string>::iterator it;
00052     string line;
00053     int ntriples = 0;
00054 
00055     // Input File/Pipe management
00056     FILE *filePipe;
00057     std::string pipeCommand;
00058     ifstream *fileStream = NULL;
00059     boost::fdistream *pipeStream = NULL;
00060 
00061     // RDF Parser
00062     RDFSyntaxMediator rdfmediator;
00063     DictionaryTriples dictionaryTriples;
00064 
00065     if (parsed) {
00066         // Performing HDT on the set of properties
00067         // ***************************************
00068 
00069         // 1) Opening the dataset
00070         it = properties.find(DATASET);
00071         string &datasetName = it->second;
00072 
00073         if (stringHasEnding(datasetName, ".gz")) {
00074             pipeCommand = "gunzip -c ";
00075         } else if (stringHasEnding(datasetName, ".bz2")) {
00076             pipeCommand = "bunzip2 -c ";
00077         }
00078 
00079         if (pipeCommand.length() > 0) {
00080             pipeCommand.append(datasetName);
00081 
00082             if ((filePipe = popen(pipeCommand.c_str(), "r")) == NULL) {
00083                 throw "popen() failed";
00084             }
00085 
00086             input = pipeStream = new boost::fdistream(fileno(filePipe));
00087         } else {
00088             input = fileStream = new ifstream(datasetName.c_str());
00089         }
00090         if (!input->good()) {
00091             cout << "   <ERROR> Please check the dataset in " << datasetName
00092                     << endl;
00093             return false;
00094         }
00095 
00096         // 2) Testing dictionary options: it is built on a first pass
00097         //    which gathers statistics and performs the chosen ordering.
00098         //    First, the ordering parameter is retrieved and next the
00099         //    chosen dictionary class is instantiated.
00100         getTime(&t2);
00101         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00102                 << "]  Building Dictionary from " << datasetName << endl;
00103 
00104         it = properties.find(D_ORDERING);
00105 
00106         if ((it->second).compare(VD_ORDERING_LEX) == 0) {
00107             // ** Lexicographic ordering **
00108             it = properties.find(D_ENCODING);
00109             if ((it->second).compare(VPLAIN) == 0) {
00110                 // PLAIN dictionary on hash tables: checking (optional) 
00111                 // size configuration.
00112                 it = properties.find(HASH_SIZE);
00113 
00114                 if (it != properties.end()) {
00115                     // New plain dictionary with the chosen size.                   
00116                     dictionary
00117                             = new PlainDictionary(atoi((it->second).c_str()));
00118                 } else {
00119                     // New plain dictionary with the by default size.
00120                     dictionary = new PlainDictionary();
00121                 }
00122             } else if ((it->second).compare(VD_ENCODING_IND) == 0) {
00123                 // INDEXED dictionary (for future)
00124                 cout
00125                         << "   <WARNING> Indexed Dictionary encoding is not currently supported"
00126                         << endl;
00127                 return false;
00128             } else {
00129                 cout << "   <ERROR> Dictionary encoding " << it->second
00130                         << " is not supported" << endl;
00131                 return false;
00132             }
00133         } else {
00134             cout << "   <ERROR> Dictionary ordering " << it->second
00135                     << " is not supported" << endl;
00136             return false;
00137         }
00138 
00139         //@javi
00140         // Checks RDF syntax; only n3 is currently supported.
00141 
00142         it = properties.find(RDF_PARSER);
00143         if ((it != properties.end()) && (it->second).compare(RDF_PARSER_OWN)
00144                 == 0) {
00145             node = new string[3];
00146 
00147             while (getline(*input, line)) {
00148                 //cout << "> " << line << endl;
00149                 ntriples++;
00150                 parseTripleN3(line);
00151                 dictionary->checkTriple(node);
00152             }
00153         } else {
00154             it = properties.find(DATASET);
00155 
00156             dictionaryTriples.dictionary = dictionary;
00157             dictionaryTriples.triples = NULL;
00158             dictionaryTriples.ntriples = new int();
00159             *dictionaryTriples.ntriples = 0;
00160             rdfmediator.parsing(const_cast<char*> (it->second.c_str()),
00161                     dictionaryTriples);
00162             ntriples = *dictionaryTriples.ntriples;
00163         }
00164 
00165         dictionary->split();
00166 
00167         // 3) Sorting Dictionary (LEXICOGRAPHIC)
00168         //    Retrieve the id mapping choice
00169         getTime(&t2);
00170         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00171                 << "]  Sorting Dictionary" << endl;
00172 
00173         it = properties.find(MAPPING);
00174         if ((it->second).compare(VMAPPING_1) == 0) {
00175             mapping = MAPPING1;
00176         } else if ((it->second).compare(VMAPPING_2) == 0) {
00177             mapping = MAPPING2;
00178         } else {
00179             cout << "   <ERROR> Mapping " << it->second << " is not supported"
00180                     << endl;
00181             return false;
00182         }
00183 
00184         dictionary->lexicographicSort(mapping);
00185 
00186         // 4) Testing triples options: it is built on a second pass.
00187         //    The graph parsing is retrieved and the object is 
00188         //    instantiated by according with the encoding choice. The
00189         //    resultant structure is finally sorted on parsing choice.
00190         getTime(&t2);
00191         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Building Triples"
00192                 << endl;
00193 
00195         if (pipeCommand.length() > 0) { // Cannot seek on pipes
00196             // Close old pipe
00197             delete pipeStream;
00198             pclose(filePipe);
00199 
00200             // Create new one from the begining
00201             if ((filePipe = popen(pipeCommand.c_str(), "r")) == NULL) {
00202                 throw "popen() failed";
00203             }
00204 
00205             input = pipeStream = new boost::fdistream(fileno(filePipe));
00206 
00207         } else {
00208             input->clear();
00209             input->seekg(0, ios::beg);
00210         }
00211 
00212         it = properties.find(PARSING);
00213         if ((it->second).compare(VPARSING_SPO) == 0) {
00214             parsing = SPO;
00215         } else if ((it->second).compare(VPARSING_SOP) == 0) {
00216             parsing = SOP;
00217         } else if ((it->second).compare(VPARSING_PSO) == 0) {
00218             parsing = PSO;
00219         } else if ((it->second).compare(VPARSING_POS) == 0) {
00220             parsing = POS;
00221         } else if ((it->second).compare(VPARSING_OSP) == 0) {
00222             parsing = OSP;
00223 
00224             if (mapping == MAPPING1) {
00226                 // Estas dos no las soportamos porque al utilizar este
00227                 // mapeo se rompe la continuidad en la asignaciÃ³n de
00228                 // identificadores para los objetos.
00229                 // ***********
00230                 cout << "   <ERROR> Configuration with mapping = " << parsing
00231                         << " and parsing = " << parsing << " is not supported"
00232                         << endl;
00233                 return false;
00234             }
00235 
00236         } else if ((it->second).compare(VPARSING_OPS) == 0) {
00237             parsing = OPS;
00238             if (mapping == MAPPING1) {
00240                 // Estas dos no las soportamos porque al utilizar este
00241                 // mapeo se rompe la continuidad en la asignaciÃ³n de
00242                 // identificadores para los objetos.
00243                 // ***********
00244                 cout << "   <ERROR> Configuration with mapping = " << parsing
00245                         << " and parsing = " << parsing << " is not supported"
00246                         << endl;
00247                 return false;
00248             }
00249 
00250         } else {
00251             cout << "   <ERROR> Mapping " << it->second << " is not supported"
00252                     << endl;
00253             return false;
00254         }
00255 
00256         it = properties.find(T_ENCODING);
00257         if ((it->second).compare(VPLAIN) == 0) {
00258             // PLAIN triples
00259             triples = new PlainTriples(dictionary, ntriples, parsing);
00260             t_encoding = PLAIN;
00261         } else if ((it->second).compare(VT_ENCODING_COMP) == 0) {
00262             // COMPACT triples  
00263             triples = new CompactTriples(dictionary, ntriples, parsing);
00264             t_encoding = COMPACT;
00265         } else if ((it->second).compare(VT_ENCODING_BIT) == 0) {
00266             // BITMAP triples   
00267             triples = new BitmapTriples(dictionary, ntriples, parsing);
00268             t_encoding = BITMAP;
00269         } else if ((it->second).compare(VT_ENCODING_K2) == 0) {
00270             // K2TREE triples (for future)
00271             t_encoding = K2TREE;
00272             cout
00273                     << "   <WARNING> K2-tree Triples encoding is not currently supported"
00274                     << endl;
00275         } else {
00276             cout << "   <ERROR> Triples encoding " << it->second
00277                     << " is not supported" << endl;
00278         }
00279 
00280         int subject, predicate, object;
00281 
00282         //@javi
00283         // Checks RDF syntax; only n3 is currently supported.
00284 
00285 
00286         it = properties.find(RDF_PARSER);
00287         if ((it != properties.end()) && (it->second).compare(RDF_PARSER_OWN)
00288                 == 0) {
00289             while (getline(*input, line)) {
00290                 parseTripleN3(line);
00291 
00292                 subject = dictionary->retrieveID(node[0], VOC_SUBJECT);
00293                 predicate = dictionary->retrieveID(node[1], VOC_PREDICATE);
00294                 object = dictionary->retrieveID(node[2], VOC_OBJECT);
00295 
00296                 triples->insert(subject, predicate, object);
00297             }
00298         } else {
00299             it = properties.find(DATASET);
00300             rdfmediator;
00301             dictionaryTriples.triples = triples;
00302             rdfmediator.parsing(const_cast<char*> (it->second.c_str()),
00303                     dictionaryTriples);
00304 
00305         }
00306         triples->graphSort();
00307 
00308         // 5) Clustering is only available for parsing 'pso'.
00309         if (parsing == PSO) {
00310             it = properties.find(CLUSTER);
00311             if (it != properties.end()) {
00312                 if ((it->second).compare(VYES) == 0) {
00313                     getTime(&t2);
00314                     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00315                             << "]  Clustering" << endl;
00316                     ClusterAlgorithm1 cluster;
00317                     cluster.startClustering(triples);
00318                     cluster.doClusteringIteration(0);
00319                 }
00320             }
00321         }
00322 
00323         // 6) Writing Dictionary
00324         getTime(&t2);
00325         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Writing HDT"
00326                 << endl;
00327 
00328         string outputPath;
00329         int d_separator;
00330 
00331         it = properties.find(OUTPUT);
00332         if (it != properties.end()) {
00333             outputPath = it->second;
00334         } else {
00335             cout
00336                     << "   <WARNING> Not found output information -> HDT results stored in current location"
00337                     << endl;
00338             outputPath = "./default";
00339         }
00340         mkpathfile(outputPath.c_str(), 0744);
00341 
00342         it = properties.find(D_SEPARATOR);
00343         if (it != properties.end()) {
00344             d_separator = atoi((it->second).c_str());
00345         } else {
00346             cout
00347                     << "   <WARNING> By default '\2' character is used in the Dictionary encoding"
00348                     << endl;
00349             d_separator = 2;
00350         }
00351 
00352         dictionary->write(outputPath, d_separator);
00353         /*                  
00354          if (property.compare(D_COMPRESSION) == 0)
00355          {
00356          d_compression = "";
00357          if (value.compare(VD_COMPRESSION_PPM) == 0) d_compression = VD_COMPRESSION_PPM;
00358          if (value.compare(VD_COMPRESSION_LZ) == 0) d_compression = VD_COMPRESSION_LZ;
00359          if (value.compare(VNONE) == 0) d_compression = VNONE;
00360 
00361          if (d_compression.compare("") == 0)
00362          {
00363          cout << "   <ERROR> Dictionary compression " << value << " is not supported" << endl;
00364          parsed = false;
00365          }
00366          }
00367          */
00368 
00369         // 7) Writing Triples
00370         //    Returns the number of triples effectively writen (note
00371         //    that the original dataset can contain repeated triples)
00372         ntriples = triples->write(outputPath);
00373 
00374         /* CompresiÃ³n de los triples
00375          *
00376          if (property.compare(T_COMPRESSION) == 0)
00377          {
00378          t_compression = "";
00379          if (value.compare(VD_COMPRESSION_HUF) == 0) t_compression = VD_COMPRESSION_HUF;
00380          if (value.compare(VNONE) == 0) t_compression = VNONE;
00381 
00382          if (t_compression.compare("") == 0)
00383          {
00384          cout << "   <ERROR> Triples compression " << value << " is not supported" << endl;
00385          parsed = false;
00386          }
00387          }
00388          */
00389 
00390         // 8) Writing Header
00391         header = new Header(parsing, mapping, d_separator, t_encoding,
00392                 dictionary->getNsubjects(), dictionary->getNpredicates(),
00393                 dictionary->getNobjects(), dictionary->getSsubobj(), ntriples,
00394                 dictionary->getNLiterals(), dictionary->getMaxID());
00395         header->write(outputPath);
00396 
00397         //header->write(outputPath, parsing, mapping, d_separator, t_encoding, 
00398         //            dictionary->getNsubjects(), dictionary->getNpredicates(), dictionary->getNobjects(), dictionary->getSsubobj(), ntriples);
00399 
00400         // 9) Checking optional gnuplot generation (only for parsings 
00401         //    'pso' and 'pos')
00402         if ((parsing == PSO) || (parsing == POS)) {
00403             it = properties.find(GNUPLOT_PATH);
00404             if (it != properties.end()) {
00405                 string &gnuplotPath = it->second;
00406                 mkpathfile(gnuplotPath.c_str(), 0744);
00407 
00408                 getTime(&t2);
00409                 cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00410                         << "]  Generating Gnuplot on " << gnuplotPath << endl;
00411 
00412                 int max = dictionary->getMaxID();
00413                 int npredicates = dictionary->getNpredicates();
00414                 vector < string > predicates(npredicates + 1);
00415 
00416                 for (int i = 1; i <= npredicates; i++) {
00417                     string p = dictionary->retrieveString(i, VOC_PREDICATE);
00418                     predicates[i] = p;
00419                 }
00420                 triples->gnuplot(npredicates, predicates, max,
00421                         gnuplotPath.c_str());
00422             }
00423         }
00424 
00425         // 10) In and Out Degree
00426         it = properties.find(DEGREE_PATH);
00427         if (it != properties.end() && ((parsing == SPO) || (parsing == PSO))) {
00428             getTime(&t2);
00429             cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00430                     << "]  Calculate Degree Metrics on " << it->second << endl;
00431 
00432             mkpathfile((it->second).c_str(), 0744);
00433             triples->calculateDegrees(it->second);
00434         }
00435 
00436         // All done
00437         getTime(&t2);
00438         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  All done" << endl;
00439     } else {
00440         cout << endl << "   <ERROR> Revised parsing errors" << endl;
00441         return false;
00442     }
00443 
00444     if (pipeCommand.length() > 0) {
00445         delete pipeStream;
00446         input = NULL;
00447         pclose(filePipe);
00448     } else {
00449         fileStream->close();
00450         delete fileStream;
00451         input = NULL;
00452     }
00453 
00454     delete[] node;
00455 
00456     return true;
00457 }
00458 
00463 bool RDFParser::parseConfig(char* pathFile) {
00464     bool parsed = true;
00465 
00466     string line;
00467     string property;
00468     string value;
00469 
00470     map<string, string>::iterator it;
00471 
00472     config.open(pathFile, ifstream::in);
00473 
00474     if (config.good()) {
00475         // Load a map with all pair property-value
00476         while (getline(config, line)) {
00477             if (line.length() > 0) {
00478                 size_t pos = line.find("=");
00479 
00480                 if (pos != string::npos) {
00481                     // Read property-value
00482                     property = line.substr(0, pos);
00483                     value = line.substr(pos + 1);
00484 
00485                     // Remove spaces
00486                     property.erase(remove_if(property.begin(), property.end(),
00487                             isblank), property.end());
00488                     value.erase(remove_if(value.begin(), value.end(), isblank),
00489                             value.end());
00490 
00491                     it = properties.begin();
00492                     properties.insert(it,
00493                             pair<string, string> (property, value));
00494                 }
00495             }
00496         }
00497 
00498         parsed = true;
00499     } else {
00500         cout << "   <ERROR> Check the config file in " << pathFile << endl;
00501         parsed = false;
00502     }
00503 
00504     return parsed;
00505 }
00506 
00511 void RDFParser::parseTripleN3(string t) {
00512     string value = t;
00513     int pos = 0;
00514     int firstIndex = 0;
00515     int lastIndex = 0;
00516     bool errorParsing = false;
00517 
00518     node[0] = "";
00519     node[1] = "";
00520     node[2] = "";
00521 
00522     while (true) {
00523         value = value.substr(firstIndex);
00524 
00525         if (value == "." || value == "\n" || value == "" || value.at(0) == '#')
00526             break;
00527 
00528         //obvious space
00529         if (value.at(0) == ' ') {
00530             //do nothing
00531             lastIndex = 0;
00532         }
00533         //URI
00534         else if (value.at(0) == '<') {
00535             lastIndex = value.find(">");
00536             //check size of pos
00537             if (pos > 2) {
00538                 errorParsing = true;
00539                 break;
00540             }
00541             node[pos] = value.substr(0, lastIndex + 1);
00542             pos++;
00543         }
00544         //Literal
00545         else if (value.at(0) == '"') {
00546             lastIndex = value.find('"', 1);
00547             //check if literal is escaped
00548             while (true) {
00549                 bool escaped = false;
00550                 int temp = lastIndex - 1;
00551 
00552                 while (temp > 0 && value.at(temp) == '\\') {
00553                     if (escaped)
00554                         escaped = false;
00555                     else
00556                         escaped = true;
00557                     temp--;
00558                 }
00559 
00560                 if (!escaped)
00561                     break;
00562                 lastIndex++;
00563                 if (lastIndex == value.length())
00564                     //Cannot find the (unescaped) end
00565                     errorParsing = true;
00566                 lastIndex = value.find('"', lastIndex);
00567                 if (lastIndex == string::npos)
00568                     //Cannot find the (unescaped) end
00569                     errorParsing = true;
00570             }
00571 
00572             // literal can extend to a bit more than just the ",
00573             // also take into account lang and datatype strings
00574             if (value.at(lastIndex + 1) == '@') {
00575                 // find end of literal/lang tag
00576                 lastIndex = value.find(' ', lastIndex + 1) - 1;
00577             } else if (value.at(lastIndex + 1) == '^') {
00578                 lastIndex = value.find('>', lastIndex + 1);
00579             }
00580             //check size of pos
00581             if (pos > 2) {
00582                 errorParsing = true;
00583                 break;
00584             }
00585             node[pos] = value.substr(0, lastIndex + 1);
00586             pos++;
00587         }
00588         //blank, a variable, a relative predicate
00589         else if (value.at(0) == '_' || (value.find(":") != string::npos)) {
00590             lastIndex = value.find(" ");
00591             //check size of pos
00592             if (pos > 2) {
00593                 errorParsing = true;
00594                 break;
00595             }
00596             node[pos] = value.substr(0, lastIndex);
00597             pos++;
00598         }
00599         //parameter or variable ---> obviate for Triples. In future, add to a Hash
00600         else if (value.at(0) == '@' || value.at(0) == '?') {
00601             break;
00602         }
00603         // test if number
00604         else {
00605             // else it is a parsing error
00606             lastIndex = value.find(" ");
00607             for (int j = 0; j < lastIndex; j++) {
00608                 if (!isdigit(value.at(j)) && value.at(j) != '.' && value.at(j)
00609                         != ',') {
00610                     errorParsing = true;
00611                 }
00612             }
00613 
00614             if (errorParsing == false) {
00615                 node[pos] = value.substr(0, lastIndex);
00616                 pos++;
00617             }
00618 
00619             break;
00620         }
00621 
00622         firstIndex = lastIndex + 1;
00623     }
00624 
00625     if (errorParsing == true) {
00626         char* except =
00627                 (char*) " :*********** FORMAT ERROR (NOT N3?) ***********";
00628         throw except;
00629     } else if (pos != 0 && pos != 3) {
00630         char* except =
00631                 (char*) " :*********** FORMAT ERROR (NOT N3?) ***********";
00632         throw except;
00633     }
00634 }
00635 
00637 RDFParser::~RDFParser() {
00638     delete header;
00639     delete dictionary;
00640     delete triples;
00641 }
